files.description: Primary EHI export documentation (6 pages). Contains export format description (ZIP with C-CDA XML, JSON, and original files), usage instructions, and Patient Search/C-CDA API endpoints. 4 of 6 pages are terms and conditions.

FHIR R4 API documentation (27 pages). Covers 15 US Core resources (Patient, AllergyIntolerance, CarePlan, CareTeam, Condition, Device, DiagnosticReport, DocumentReference, Goal, Immunization, MedicationRequest, Observation, Procedure, Encounter, Provenance). This is the (g)(10) API, not the (b)(10) export, but provides context for the clinical data the system can expose.
Patient API documentation (6 pages). Nearly identical to the EHI Export doc â€” same patient search and C-CDA retrieval endpoints. Companion document for programmatic patient data access.
Screenshot of the QRS Disclosures page (top section showing page header and first Real World Testing entry)
